name: Mega Zoo Sounds Laugh and Learn With Amazing Animal Voices for Baby and Toddler
name_original: Mega Zoo Sounds Laugh and Learn With Amazing Animal Voices for Baby and Toddler
description:
Amazing images and sounds of animals entertain your baby at home, in the car, in the waiting room and in many other places.

For the youngest children slideshow mode is available.

With the language change option the animal sounds application can also be used as a set of cards to learn the language.

Using the application is very simple. Just use the buttons or gestures to switch between animals and impress wonderful animal sounds.

Now you can test your knowledge about animals playing logical game.
